inlineContent.text: This structure contains the custom OpenGL rendering context, with the ids of all OpenGL resources uploaded to the GPU.

abstract.text: Allocate resources in custom OpenGL context; fontscale is mjtFontScale.
Read pixels from current OpenGL framebuffer to client buffer. Viewport is in OpenGL framebuffer; client buffer starts at (0,0).
number of samples for default/window framebuffer
Blit from src viewpoint in current framebuffer to dst viewport in other framebuffer. If src, dst have different size and flg_depth==0, color is interpolated with GL_LINEAR.
offscreen depth and stencil buffer for resolving multisamples
Draw text at (x,y) in relative coordinates; font is mjtFont.
Set Aux buffer for custom OpenGL rendering (call restoreBuffer when done).
A protocol all Mj* struct conforms to to faciliate some reflection. The conformance is generated in MjObject+Extensions.swift
Draw rectangle with centered text. font is mjtFont.
Upload mesh to GPU, overwriting previous upload if any.
Read pixels from current OpenGL framebuffer to client buffer. Viewport is in OpenGL framebuffer; client buffer starts at (0,0).
Read pixels from current OpenGL framebuffer to client buffer. Viewport is in OpenGL framebuffer; client buffer starts at (0,0).
all builtin geoms, with quality from model
Add Aux buffer with given index to context; free previous Aux buffer.
Draw text overlay; font is mjtFont; gridpos is mjtGridPos.
Blit from Aux buffer to con->currentBuffer.
currently active framebuffer: mjFB_WINDOW or mjFB_OFFSCREEN
Set OpenGL framebuffer for rendering: mjFB_WINDOW or mjFB_OFFSCREEN. framebuffer is mjtFramebuffer. If only one buffer is available, set that buffer and ignore framebuffer argument.
is stereo available for default/window framebuffer
Draw pixels from client buffer to current OpenGL framebuffer. Viewport is in OpenGL framebuffer; client buffer starts at (0,0).
all buildin geoms, with quality from model
fraction of light cutoff for spot lights
Upload height field to GPU, overwriting previous upload if any.
Upload texture to GPU, overwriting previous upload if any.
Get maximum viewport for active buffer.
offscreen color buffer for resolving multisamples
Change font of existing context; fontscale is mjtFontScale.
